title: Final Cut - Ladies and Gentlemen (Holgyeim es Uraim) - Gyrogi Pa
description:
TITLE....... Final Cut: Ladies & Gentlemen (Final Cut: HÃƒÂ¶lgyeim ÃƒÂ©s uraim)

YEAR........ 2012

DIRECTOR.... GyÃƒÂ¶rgy PÃƒÂ¡lfi (Taxidermia, Hukkle)

COUNTRY..... Hungary

PLOT........ It's a typical love story between a man and a woman, but it's made from a collage of 500 movie excerpts taken from many countries and covering every era of cinema. Final Cut is the ultimate meta-film telling the ultimate love story.

LANGUAGE.... All kinds (it varies on various excerpts, depending on the language of the original film)

SUBTITLES... Hardcoded hungarian (Not the best when it comes to understanding the excerpts from non-english countries, but the collage tells the story in a way that doesn't require the understanding of every single word to udnerstand the story)
